languages.text: "Выдвигаю гипотезу, что мои услуги не будут востребованы". {n}В голосе Паскаля слышны разочарование и смирение.{/n}
"I hypothesise that my services will not be needed." {n}The disappointment and resignation are clear in Pasqal's voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Выдвигаю гипотезу, что мои услуги не будут востребованы". {n}В голосе Паскаля слышны разочарование и смирение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I hypothesise that my services will not be needed." {n}The disappointment and resignation are clear in Pasqal's voice.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我猜测你并不需要我的服务。”{n}帕斯卡的声音中流露出了明显的失望与无奈。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that my services will not be needed." {n}The disappointment and resignation are clear in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我猜测你并不需要我的服务。”{n}帕斯卡的声音中流露出了明显的失望与无奈。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Tengo la hipótesis de que mis servicios no serán necesarios». {n}La decepción y la resignación se combinan en la voz de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that my services will not be needed." {n}The disappointment and resignation are clear in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tengo la hipótesis de que mis servicios no serán necesarios». {n}La decepción y la resignación se combinan en la voz de Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「自分の奉仕は必要ないだろうと仮定します」{n}パスカルの声には、失望と諦念がはっきりと現れていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that my services will not be needed." {n}The disappointment and resignation are clear in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「自分の奉仕は必要ないだろうと仮定します」{n}パスカルの声には、失望と諦念がはっきりと現れていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich nehme an, dass meine Dienste nicht benötigt werden." {n}In Pasqals Stimme klingen unzweifelhaft Enttäuschung und Resignation mit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that my services will not be needed." {n}The disappointment and resignation are clear in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme an, dass meine Dienste nicht benötigt werden." {n}In Pasqals Stimme klingen unzweifelhaft Enttäuschung und Resignation mit.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je suppose que mes services ne seront pas requis, » {n}déclare Pasqal sur un ton qui exprime clairement sa déception et sa résignation.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that my services will not be needed." {n}The disappointment and resignation are clear in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suppose que mes services ne seront pas requis, » {n}déclare Pasqal sur un ton qui exprime clairement sa déception et sa résignation.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Varsayımlarıma göre hizmetlerime ihtiyaç duyulmayacak." {n}Pasqal'ın sesindeki hayal kırıklığı ve çaresizlik, açık şekilde duyuluyor.{/n}
